description: A group of fourteen dogs is sitting and lying down on a grassy hill
A colorful market street with fresh produce and people walking.
This image depicts a small medical waiting area where a healthcare professional is examining a patient.

This image shows children in a classroom engaged in various creative activities. Several students sit around a large wooden table, working on crafts such as painting, coloring, and cutting shapes out of paper. One boy wears an artistâ€™s apron as he paints on an easel. A teacher stands off to the side, talking to a small group of students, while another adult nearby holds a clipboard and observes. The room features bright natural light from a window, classroom decorations like alphabet charts and a wall clock, and art supplies scattered across the tables, suggesting a fun, art-focused lesson
A busy city street at night with bright neon signs.
This illustration shows a modern airport terminal with large windows and travelers waiting.

This image shows a cozy picnic scene with a red, checkered blanket spread on the grass. A wicker picnic basket holds bread, fruit, and flowers, while smaller baskets contain additional treats. Two white mugs rest on a small wooden board, ready for a warm drink. Gentle sunlight bathes the setting, creating a tranquil atmosphere for outdoor dining.
